solution_line_template: There are {num_dogs} dogs and they each bark {barks_per_dog_per_minute} times per minute so together they bark {num_dogs}*{barks_per_dog_per_minute} = <<{num_dogs}*{barks_per_dog_per_minute}={barks_per_minute}>>{barks_per_minute} times per minute

{num_dogs} dogs bark a combined total of {barks_per_minute} times per minutes, after {minutes} minutes they will have barked {barks_per_minute}*{minutes} = <<{barks_per_minute}*{minutes}={total_barks}>>{total_barks} times
